name: Veritis Group
overview:
Veritis is an Information Technology Growth Partner that you can depend on.

Founded by technocrats with the sole mission to provide full scale Information Technology services, Veritis continues to build and expand business value to a number of small, medium and Fortune 500 companies.

There simplistic approach starts with you and your critical needs in mind. So be it your IT Staffing needs or Business Solutions protocol, They help there clients plan, design and deploy customized solutions that give them an unparalleled technical competitiveness to reach their short term and long term goals.

There goal is to deliver and drive our clientsâ€™ IT initiatives in tough economic times within their budget, project scope and timelines with unsurpassed quality as the highest priority.
